Document: # Rule C2: Prisoner Guidelines By picking the prisoner role, you have chosen to roleplay as a prisoner. You are still subject to the same rules regarding escalation, and should only seek to escape from the brig with excellent reasoning (e.g. abusive security personnel or badly damaged brig). - Escaping for no reason is considered a self-antagonistic activity. - If you are unsure whether your escape reason is valid, feel free to AHelp it first. [color=#ff0000]Lack of administrator response does not constitute approval.[/color]
